title: Constant RUSCHÉ (Ascol57)
proj1_description: Plugin development and graphic design for a unique, immersive gaming experience
proj1_today_p1: I'm working on a brand new game mode called Off The Base. For now there is no trailer or demo to show.
proj1_before_p1: I previously worked on the server Explodium, a skyblock server with innovative mechanics and a small community of around a hundred players.
proj2_description: Forum creation, administration, web development, bots and community tools
proj2_today_p1: I no longer run forums. I assist friends or those in need by helping moderate communities and providing tools.
proj2_before_p1: I founded a French help forum called Particule Informatique. Everything took place on Discord. I created tools to let users write and share guides.
proj2_before_p2: I also ran an international music team, Subwoofer Studio, which taught me a lot. I created AI-based audio moderation tools that work multilingual. My moderation was tested during a raid.
proj3_description: Custom Discord bots to automate and improve user experience
proj3_today_p1: I'm working on WebPing, a webhook alert system to monitor web services and social networks in real time, "free and unlimited". The product is not yet public.
proj3_today_p2: I help maintain UltionRoid, a music bot. The other founder and I try to keep it alive without adding new features.
proj3_today_p3: I still develop private bots to meet specific needs.
proj3_before_p1: I co-founded UltionRoid, a music bot. It still exists but is no longer actively developed.
proj4_description: Innovative tools for streamers and content creators
proj4_p1: It's a tool linking Castmate to any browser. Using ngrok tunnels, this panel can even be used outside the LAN.
proj4_p2: It's a web-deployable software that lets people listen to the same private playlist live with others. Drop mp3 or wav files into the /music folder and start the apps.
proj4_p3: It's an automation app for streaming on Twitch, developed by LordTocs. It manages OBS scenes, alerts, chat commands, and more. I don't develop it, but I contribute bug reports and feature ideas.
